Introduction

K/DA is a virtual girl group created by Riot Games, the developer of the popular online game League of Legends. The group consists of four characters from the game: Ahri, Akali, Evelynn, and Kai'Sa. Their songs are voiced by multiple artists.

They made their debut on November 3, 2018, with their hit single ‟POP/STARS”, which became a global sensation. Two years later, they returned with their EP “ALL OUT”, featuring Seraphine.
